cards.name: Debris Pile
cards.description: At the end of this turn, gain 3 Block for each card in your hand.

cards.name: Debris Pile+

cards.description:
Exhaust 2 cards.
Add 2 random cards into your hand.

Exhaust 3 cards.
Add 3 random cards into your hand.

Add a Wound into your hand.
Gain [E].

cards.name: Neurons
cards.description:
Become Confused.
At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 1 this combat.

cards.name: Newrons
cards.description:
Become Confused.
At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 1 this combat.

cards.name: Ascender's Banana
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Whenever you draw this card, Exhaust it and gain 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Teyered
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Whenever you draw this card, you cannot draw additional cards this turn.

relics.name: Byrd Beak
relics.description: Every 7th Attack you play applies 1 Vulnerable.
relics.flavorText: It's important to stay at the top of the pecking order in the Spire.

relics.name: Electric Rodn't
relics.description: Every time you Channel 5 Lightning, Channel an additional Lightning.
relics.flavorText: Not to be confused with its mammal counterpart, the pookachimp.

relics.name: Elefent Mask
relics.description: At the start of each combat, the enemy with the most HP loses 8 Strength this turn.
relics.flavorText: So come find me... I'M IN YOUR SOUL.

relics.name: Kinetic Charger
relics.description: Whenever you play a card that costs at least [E] [E] [E] , gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: Less of a charger, more of a way to reuse energy.

relics.name: Maw Jerky
relics.description: At the end of Elite combats, raise your Max HP by 4.
relics.flavorText: Classic salt and heat makes for a delicious snack on the go.

relics.name: Treaders
relics.description: The first time you draw a Status card or Curse each combat, Exhaust it and draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: Thick boots to keep you on your feet.

relics.name: Charschor Blot
relics.description: Upon pickup, remove a card from your deck and choose 1 of 25 upgraded cards to add into your deck.
relics.flavorText: What do you see?

relics.name: Dirty Lipstick
relics.description: Upon pickup, permanently increase the damage and Block of all Basic cards by 2.
relics.flavorText: Covered in mud and slop. Looks like some swine got its hooves on it.

relics.name: Poopsie Roll
relics.description: At the start of each combat, deal damage equal to one third of your missing HP to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Do you really want to eat this?

relics.name: Ship in a Bottle
relics.description: Future card rewards have 1 random card upgraded.
relics.flavorText: Go wherever the seas tell you.

relics.name: Tiny Steamboat
relics.description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, put 2 cards from your draw pile into your hand at the start of next combat.
relics.flavorText: Many people mistaken this steamboat as a tea set! Can you believe that?

relics.name: Wyrm Jar
relics.description: Every time you Exhaust 3 cards in a single combat, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: These special wyrms decompose waste and "produce" a powerful muscle nutrient.

relics.name: Bonfire Dress
relics.description: If you do not play the same type of card twice in a row this turn, gain 1 Dexterity at the start of you next turn.
relics.flavorText: Dondo panpa panpa dondo pan panpa pa!

relics.name: Flakhammer
relics.description: The first Attack played each turn that costs 2 or more applies 1 Weak and 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Shake the floor.

relics.name: Iron Flakes
relics.description: Whenever you lose HP in combat, heal 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: These were once a popular cereal brand before the Spireblight hit.

relics.name: Still-Not-Adequate House
relics.description:
Upon pickup, gain 90 Gold.
Raise your Max HP by 6.
Upgrade 1 random Attack.
Upgrade 1 random Skill.
Upgrade 1 random Power card.
relics.flavorText: "It's still not adequate." -The Architect

relics.name: Thorny Gelberry
relics.description: Whenever you are attacked, gain 1 Thorns.
relics.flavorText: This gelatinous fruit has a spiked layer to protect itself from anyone smashing it open.

relics.name: Whoaram Alpha
relics.description: Every time you Channel 2 Orbs in a single turn, gain 1 Focus and lose 1 Focus at the end of this turn.
relics.flavorText: exe: "d/dx ex = e xd"

relics.name: Blandfruit
relics.description: Perhaps it could be cooked.
relics.flavorText: It tastes like caked dust.

relics.name: Blindfruit
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Intangible.
relics.flavorText: It looks ready to be eaten!

relics.name: Broken Vision
relics.description: Start each combat Confused.
relics.flavorText: Sickness bag required.

relics.name: Dreamfruit
relics.description: All debuffs you have last up to 1 turn.
relics.flavorText: It looks ready to be eaten!

relics.name: Earthfruit
relics.description: Start each combat with 4 Barkskin.
relics.flavorText: It looks ready to be eaten!

relics.name: Fadefruit
relics.description: At the start of each combat, draw 1 less card and put 1 card from your draw pile into your hand.
relics.flavorText: It looks ready to be eaten!

relics.name: Firefruit
relics.description: At the start of each combat, deal 15 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: It looks ready to be eaten!

relics.name: Hand-Knit Scarf
relics.description: Whenever you Channel an Orb, gain 1 Block.
relics.flavorText: It gives you the warm fuzzies inside!

relics.name: Icefruit
relics.description: At the start of your first 3 turns, ALL enemies lose 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: It looks ready to be eaten!

relics.name: Rotfruit
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: It looks ready to be eaten!

relics.name: Silk Garment
relics.description: The first time you discard a card each turn, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: You feel loose and limber in your new outfit!

relics.name: Sorrowfruit
relics.description: Whenever you apply a non-Poison debuff, apply 2 Poison.
relics.flavorText: It looks ready to be eaten!

relics.name: Starfruit
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 8. This and future Max HP gains are 50% more effective.
relics.flavorText: It looks ready to be eaten!

relics.name: Stormfruit
relics.description: Whenever you Channel a Lightning, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: It looks ready to be eaten!

relics.name: Sunfruit
relics.description: Whenever you climb a floor, heal 3 HP.
relics.flavorText: It looks ready to be eaten!

relics.name: Swiftfruit
relics.description: The first card you play each turn gains double Block.
relics.flavorText: It looks ready to be eaten!

relics.name: Tanned Gloves
relics.description: Every time you Exhaust 7 cards, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: You feel steady with your blade and ready for battle!

relics.name: Capacitor Discharge
relics.description: Start each combat with 3 Focus and 2 less Orb slots.
relics.flavorText: "I'm going to guess that this is just meant to occupy your attention, because otherwise this is some shoddy electronics work."

relics.name: Dictionifier
relics.description: Upon pickup, reduce the cost of all copies of a card in your deck to 0.
relics.flavorText: "What do you mean a blue Strike isn't the same as a red Strike?!".

relics.name: Juice Keg
relics.description: Start each combat Confused and with 1 Strength. At the start of your turn, play the highest-cost Attack in your hand.
relics.flavorText: SSWIIiiinnNNGGG!!!

relics.name: Rotten Avocado
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Whenever you climb a floor, lose 1 Max HP.
relics.flavorText: It's got fungi growing out of it. Gross.

relics.name: Solaris Essence
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of each combat, add 2 Burns into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Pretty much everywhere, it's gonna be hot.

relics.name: Aztech Ball
relics.description: Whenever you have 3 of the same type of Orb in a row, Evoke them and Channel 2 random Orbs.
relics.flavorText: These balls explode whenever 3 of the same color are put together.

relics.name: Broken Printer
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain 5 copies of a card in your deck.
relics.flavorText: At least it's honest about how broken it is.

relics.name: Glyph Stone
relics.description: Upon pickup, Transform 2 random Strike or Defend cards, then Upgrade them.
relics.flavorText: Not quite about simplicity or elegance, but rather both it seems.

relics.name: Inflatable Hammer
relics.description: Start each combat with 3 Strength. Whenever you play an Attack, lose 1 Strength this turn.
relics.flavorText: Squeak squeak!
